choices.D: neither Network A nor Network B

discussion.content: yes, Network B is correct answer. ospf is redistributed only in to eigrp 100, in R4 we can see only Network B.

questions.question_text: Which two actions must you perform to enable and use window scaling on a router? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
A. Execute the command ip tcp window-size 65536. 
 B. Set window scaling to be used on the remote host.
 C. Execute the command ip tcp queuemax.
 D. Set TCP options to "enabled" on the remote host.
 E. Execute the command ip tcp adjust-mss.

Correct answers:
 A. Execute the command ip tcp window-size 65536. 
 B. Set window scaling to be used on the remote host.

E. Router B will not advertise the 10.0.0.0/8 network because it is blocked by the ACL.

choices.A: Traffic from the 172.16.0.0/16 network will be blocked by the ACL.
choices.B: The 10.0.0.0/8 network will not be advertised by Router B because the network statement for the 10.0.0.0/8 network is missing from Router B.
